column4: 2.rep: hello. i'm in treuble. i tried many ways but doesn't work! is there a proper way to get 3D support for my radeon X1800xt (r520 chipset) ? Please HELP!
if you find one, i commend you; ATI's linux drivers are horrid; i had that exact card and never managed it, i actually got better performance out of the on-board xpress 200 series graphics
